doc:
Charles Smith (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Smith_(actor) 0 Charles Smith (September 13, 1920 – December 26, 1988) was an American character actor. He was born in Flint, Michigan. He had notable roles in The Shop Around the Corner (1940) and The Major and the Minor (1942). Smith appeared as Dizzy Stevens in nine Aldrich Family films between 1941 and 1944. He later appeared in several TV series in recurring roles. Charles_Smith ( September_13_,_1920 – December_26_,_1988 ) was an_American_character_actor . He was_born in Flint , Michigan . He had notable_roles in The_Shop Around the_Corner_(_1940_) and The_Major and the_Minor_(_1942_) . Smith appeared as Dizzy_Stevens in nine_Aldrich_Family_films between 1941_and_1944 . He later appeared in several_TV_series in recurring_roles .
